mapper.select: select p_id, Servetypeid, Siteid, s_id, Projectcode, ProjectName, State, Remarks, Type_Label, TypeId, WorkHours, CustAccountPrcie, InsidePrice, ClaimantPrcie from asms.projectsettings where p_id = #{pId}

select p_id, Servetypeid, Siteid, s_id, Projectcode, ProjectName, State, Remarks, Type_Label, TypeId, WorkHours, CustAccountPrcie, InsidePrice, ClaimantPrcie from asms.projectsettings limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into asms.projectsettings(Servetypeid, Siteid, s_id, Projectcode, ProjectName, State, Remarks, Type_Label, TypeId, WorkHours, CustAccountPrcie, InsidePrice, ClaimantPrcie) values (#{servetypeid}, #{siteid}, #{sId}, #{projectcode}, #{projectname}, #{state}, #{remarks}, #{typeLabel}, #{typeid}, #{workhours}, #{custaccountprcie}, #{insideprice}, #{claimantprcie})
mapper.update:
update asms.projectsettings
Servetypeid = #{servetypeid},
Siteid = #{siteid},
s_id = #{sId},
Projectcode = #{projectcode},
ProjectName = #{projectname},
State = #{state},
Remarks = #{remarks},
Type_Label = #{typeLabel},
TypeId = #{typeid},
WorkHours = #{workhours},
CustAccountPrcie = #{custaccountprcie},
InsidePrice = #{insideprice},
ClaimantPrcie = #{claimantprcie},
where p_id = #{pId}
